sentence.text: Mutations in sodium ion transport, a Na+ dependent OH- transporter, cause congenital hereditary endothelial dystrophy (phosphorylation of RNA polymerase II C-terminal domain) and Fuchs' endothelial corneal dystrophy (extracellular matrix organization), the two most common forms of endothelial degeneration.

entity.text: phosphorylation of RNA polymerase II C-terminal domain
